questions.question: What number comes right after 29?
questions.hint: When you count past 29, you move to a new group of ten. What is that group called?

questions.question: What number comes right after 49?
questions.hint: After the forties come the... what? Count one more after 49.

questions.question: What number comes right after 99?
questions.hint: This is a big jump! After ninety-nine comes a number with three digits.

questions.question: What number comes right after 199?
questions.hint: After one hundred ninety-nine, you reach a new hundred. Which one?

questions.question: What number comes right after 59?
questions.hint: You're leaving the fifties and entering a new group of ten.

questions.question: What number comes right after 79?
questions.hint: After seventy-nine, you start a new group. The seventies become the...

questions.question: What digit is in the tens place of 456?
questions.hint: The tens place is the middle digit. It tells you how many groups of ten.

questions.question: What digit is in the hundreds place of 738?
questions.hint: The hundreds place is the first digit on the left in a 3-digit number.

questions.question: What number comes right after 39?
questions.hint: You're leaving the thirties. What group of ten comes next?

questions.question: Which number is greater: 145 or 154?
questions.hint: Both start with 1 in the hundreds. Look at the tens place to compare.

questions.question: What number comes right after 299?
questions.hint: After two hundred ninety-nine comes a new hundred. Which one?

questions.question: What digit is in the ones place of 582?
questions.hint: The ones place is always the last digit on the right.

questions.question: What number comes right after 69?
questions.hint: After the sixties, you start counting in a new group of ten.

questions.question: Which number is greater: 89 or 98?
questions.hint: Compare the tens digits first. Which one has more tens?

questions.question: What number comes right after 109?
questions.hint: You're crossing from the one hundred and somethings to one hundred and ten.

questions.question: How do you read the number 347?
questions.hint: Start with the hundreds, then the tens, then the ones.

questions.question: What number comes right after 89?
questions.hint: After eighty-nine, you move to a new group of ten. The nineties!

questions.question: What digit is in the tens place of 925?
questions.hint: The tens place is the middle digit in a 3-digit number.

questions.question: What number comes right after 399?
questions.hint: After three hundred ninety-nine, you reach a new hundred.

questions.question: Which number is smaller: 234 or 243?
questions.hint: The hundreds are the same. Compare the tens place next.

questions.question: What number comes right after 119?
questions.hint: After one hundred nineteen, you move to one hundred twenty.

questions.question: What digit is in the hundreds place of 504?
questions.hint: Look at the first digit on the left. That shows the hundreds.

questions.question: What number comes right after 499?
questions.hint: Four hundred ninety-nine plus one equals... a nice round number!

questions.question: How do you read the number 215?
questions.hint: Start by saying the hundreds, then the rest of the number.

questions.question: What number comes right after 149?
questions.hint: After one hundred forty-nine, you reach one hundred... what?

questions.question: Which number is greater: 305 or 350?
questions.hint: Both have 3 in the hundreds. Look at the tens place to decide.

questions.question: What digit is in the ones place of 739?
questions.hint: The ones digit is the last one on the right side.

questions.question: What number comes right after 599?
questions.hint: After five hundred ninety-nine comes a brand new hundred.

questions.question: What number comes right after 189?
questions.hint: After one hundred eighty-nine, you move to one hundred ninety.

questions.question: How do you read the number 408?
questions.hint: There are 4 hundreds, 0 tens, and 8 ones. How would you say that?

questions.question: What number comes right after 129?
questions.hint: After one hundred twenty-nine, you start the one hundred thirties.

questions.question: Which number is smaller: 467 or 476?
questions.hint: The hundreds are the same. Compare the tens digits.

questions.question: What digit is in the tens place of 302?
questions.hint: Look at the middle digit. Even if it's zero, that's still the tens place!

questions.question: What number comes right after 699?
questions.hint: After six hundred ninety-nine, you reach a new hundred.

questions.question: What number comes right after 159?
questions.hint: After one hundred fifty-nine comes one hundred... what group of ten?

questions.question: How do you read the number 620?
questions.hint: There are 6 hundreds, 2 tens, and 0 ones. Say it in order!

questions.question: Which number is greater: 199 or 201?
questions.hint: Compare the hundreds place first. One number has 1 hundred, the other has 2.

questions.question: What number comes right after 799?
questions.hint: Seven hundred ninety-nine plus one is a nice round number.

questions.question: What digit is in the hundreds place of 250?
questions.hint: The hundreds place is the leftmost digit in a 3-digit number.

questions.question: What number comes right after 899?
questions.hint: After eight hundred ninety-nine, you reach the nine hundreds!
